blogPost.excerpt: Startup Job Watch is a weekly updating database of over 6000 jobs from the top startups in the world. These are all companies that were on the best of lists from publications like Business Insider, Linkedin, AngelList, and more!
blogPost.body: Startup Job Watch is a weekly updating database of over 6000 jobs from the top startups in the world. These are all companies that were on the best of lists from publications like Business Insider, Linkedin, AngelList, and more!
blogPost.title: Startup Job Watch - Database of 6000+ jobs from the top startups in the world
blogPost.author: Henry Johnson

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一个每周更新的数据库，其中包含来自世界顶级初创公司的6000多个工作岗位。这些都是来自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名单！
localize.tagline: 包含全球顶尖初创企业6000多个职位的数据库

localize.description: Startup Job Watch是一個每週更新的數據庫，其中包含來自世界頂級初創公司的6000多個工作崗位。這些都是來自Business Insider、LinkedIn、AngelList等出版物的最佳公司名單！
localize.tagline: 包含全球頂尖初創企業6000多個職位的數據庫

previous.excerpt: Hijack Your Feed is a Safari extenion that replaces Twitter ads with your todos. It creates eye-catching posts based on your Reminders, which are then hijacked into your Twitter feed. Designed to nudge you toward your intentions… and away from doom-scrolling.
previous.title: Hijack Your Feed - Replace Twitter ads with your todos

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一个Safari扩展，它用你的待办事项取代了Twitter广告。它根据你的提醒创建吸引眼球的帖子，然后这些帖子会被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在将您推向您的意图…远离末日卷轴。
localize.tagline: 用您的待办事项替换Twitter广告

localize.description: hijack your Feed是一個Safari擴展，它用你的待辦事項取代了Twitter廣告。它根據你的提醒創建吸引眼球的帖子，然後這些帖子會被劫持到你的Twitter feed中。旨在將您推向您的意圖…遠離末日卷軸。
localize.tagline: 用您的待辦事項替換Twitter廣告

next.excerpt: With Birabo, you will never lose your project files, notes, folders and links again. Share them with your team in one workspace, in real-time.
next.title: Birabo - An effortless real-time collaboration tool for teams

localize.description: 使用Birabo，您再也不会丢失项目文件、笔记、文件夹和链接。在一个工作区中实时与您的团队共享它们。
localize.tagline: 为团队提供轻松的实时协作工具

localize.description: 使用Birabo，您再也不會丟失項目文件、筆記、文件夾和鏈接。在一個工作區中實時與您的團隊共享它們。
localize.tagline: 爲團隊提供輕鬆的實時協作工具
